summary: This document is an email chain from July 27, 2019, regarding the status of inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC). It contains updates from a staff member about Epstein's condition, his complaints about dehydration and sleep issues in the SHU, and his legal visit schedule. The email subject references 'Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update'.

events.title: Epstein Status Update and Legal Visit
events.description: An email update on inmate Jeffrey Epstein's status. He was seen before his legal visit, described as stable, and was currently at a legal visit expected to last about 12 hours. He complained of dehydration due to limited bathroom breaks during legal visits and anxiety about returning to the SHU due to noise preventing sleep.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) (inferred from context of SHU and legal visits)
keyFacts: On July 27, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein was reported as 'stable' and attending a legal visit with his attorney expected to last about 12 hours.
Epstein complained of dehydration, stating he could not drink enough water due to limited bathroom breaks during his lengthy legal visits.
Epstein expressed anxiety about returning to the Special Housing Unit (SHU), citing an inability to sleep due to noise from other inmates at night.
The email subject and content indicate Epstein was under a 'Psych Observation' status, though 'Suicide Watch' was listed as 'None'.
